```{r}
print_position <- function(title, place, location, start, end, description) {
  # Split "||" into bullet lines
  bullets <- strsplit(description %||% "", "\\|\\|")[[1]]
  bullets <- bullets[nzchar(bullets)]
  if (length(bullets)) bullets <- paste0("- ", bullets)

  # IMPORTANT: leading and trailing blank lines (\n) so markdown starts/ends a block
  cat(
    "\n",  # blank line BEFORE the header
    glue::glue(
"### {title} — **{place}**{ifelse(nzchar(location), paste0(', ', location), '')}
*{start} – {end}*
{paste(bullets, collapse = '\n')}"
    ),
    "\n\n",  # blank line AFTER the bullet block
    sep = ""
  )

  invisible(NULL)
}

# print all positions (from the CSV), newest first
position_data %>%
  dplyr::filter(section == "positions") %>%
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(start)) %>%
  purrr::pwalk(~ print_position(..2, ..3, ..4, ..5, ..6, ..7))
```
